metadata.title: USN-4935-1 -- NVIDIA graphics drivers vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that the NVIDIA GPU display driver for the Linux kernel incorrectly performed access control. A local attacker could use this issue to cause a denial of service, expose sensitive information, or escalate privileges. (CVE-2021-1076)  It was discovered that the NVIDIA GPU display driver for the Linux kernel incorrectly performed reference counting. A local attacker could use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2021-1077)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4935-1` to fix the vulnerability.
